entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
